Author: Mukta Bhosle
Review Text: I have enrolled in Allen for 11th and 12th for JEE preparation. My experience with Allen has been fantastic. The faculties and all staff are extremely cooperative and I haven't faced any faculty related issues. Overall it has been a wonderful experience for me.

Author: Dhruv Bonde
Review Text: The faculties are extremely supporting guiding for the entire journey of jee which is stressful for most students but allen makes it better. The infrastructure is also quite good making it a comfortable environment for studying.

Author: Vasanti Naickar
Review Text: Excellent Coaching for school cbse and icse board  and Olympiad Engineering JEE MAIN +ADVANCED and -NEET UG entrance exam preparation .Academic is the best with experienced faculty .

Author: ritu sharma
Review Text: one of the best class for JEE/NEET in navi mumbai.worth for money.100% sucess results.faculties and Admin staff are very much supportavie.good enviroment for studies.

Author: sasidhara reddy
Review Text: If your kid having knowledge he can shine, if not they least bother  about the students. They will see their instalments and don't care about the student future just like that suggest the college for inter ....

Author: Dhvani Srivastava
Review Text: It has been a cooperative experience half way through the JEE journey at Allen Nerul.Faculty and management par excellence.

Author: shashi yadav
Review Text: Best faculty for Neet and IIT jee courses. Results are very good.

Author: Aneeta Bisht
Review Text: Best Institute for 9th ,10th ,IIT/NEET/CAFCExcellent academics with amazing results .

Author: Rajinder Kaur
Review Text: Best place for JEE/NEET preparation in Nerul.

Author: Harshvardhan Phalke
Review Text: Really good institute for further studies... Faculty is hardworking and courteous...

Author: Zaid Ajani
Review Text: I have paid a total of 43000 and thought that they would teach us high level CBSE curriculum stuff which are usually asked in Olympiads and it would prepare me for JEE exam from class 8. Due to media marketing and other marketing tactics, I had trust on them therefore, I left my CIE school and joined NIOS, and completely studied from allen and its reading material. I am thoroughly unimpressed with their system, faculties, etc. Their classes are not at all interactive and are no different from watching boring classes on YouTube. Even though I received good marks in ASAT, they put me in foundation batch and do not focus on olympiads, they just focus on easy CBSE school stuff, and make it complicated. As I was in CIE until last year, There they focused on Humanities/SST very much, and made it fun and knowledgeable, but here, they have made SST and other subject a joke and as complicated as hell; They have made subjects so complicated with their cramming strategy and freaking bad teaching atmosphere; I feel petrified after hearing the word, 'Study'. I would never recommend paying a huge amount and going to such unimpressive classes, They just have one aim, that is to make students memorize books and score just above good in their school.

Author: 5_Abhay prasad
Review Text: ITS GOOD, BUT MERA IIT ME SELECTION POSSIBLE NHI LAG RHA

Author: Kavin Hotta
Review Text: Worst experience!! The teachers here have least experience in teaching , the way they reach is horrible, literally wasted my class 11th because of this institute...

Author: Rajesh Mehta
Review Text: Institute like Allen, Nerul are business center. They can go to any level. Last year they played with career of approx 500 student when they hijacked best Akash teacher's & that in the month of November. They did this because they don't have quality faculty of its own. Today I met their one of senior faculty but he could hardly tell any value proposition of Allen & when I asked why we should Allen then he said you can join any other institute. For me  this is one of the worst institute. God save the child who will join such a useless institute.

Author: Bratati Sen
Review Text: 1) No concentration on teaching 2) After admission of children taken - no one there to reply any question parents ask. 3) Doubt classes - no teachers available. 4) During school exams if they teach & take portions then they will not teach.I know my review will be deleted by their Ad agency. Honesttly, Few schools give better attention on students.Waste of time. Only motto is to earn quick money. Then probably they buy few candidates from other institutes, good students and use them in their ADs. This year also I have seen 3 students name used in Allen - same name & face used in other institutes :) Check the faces of educational institutes' advertisements carefully. Same student was learning at RACE, ALLEN  simultaneously ?? How come same student can study in 2 different institutes full time. Education has become a business for them.

Author: Siya Vijay
Review Text: Money 💰💰💰 is institutions moto. Nothing else.Showing big big dreams and goals but nothing in real. Advertisement with old IIT students for earning students only.Save money.Save time.Save everything.Stay Away .... Self study with material.

Author: Anushka Shivanand
Review Text: Great level of teaching and very friendly faculty.

Author: Umang Singh
Review Text: I think it is doing good in Mumbai, Andheri. IITian's PACE teachers(7-8) joined ALLEN Mumbai. All toppers in minor tests are from Mumbai. But in Nerul they are failure as they are not paying attention to nerul branch. Tha physics subject is in ICU. Faculty is having marriage, on leave for 20 days. Other faculties of chemistry and maths are taking weekly once six hours lecture. SRG is not yet in mood of ALLEN Career Institute in Nerul. No single person is responsible here. Plz do research before joining IITJEE batch. Many issues are there which are unattended which i may not be able to write here. Hope situation improves, but allen is not having proper timetable, structure, faculty retention policy, oversized batches, arrogant and lazy ladies front office staff, no physics faculty,no personal attention…… GoGoes on. I hate Allen nerul.

Author: rajesh gajakosh
Review Text: Admission manager could not convinced for Jee admission when we expect lot.Premises look messy & crowded.Students classroom was unpleasant.we have been decided not to take admission at Nerul branch.

Author: Suyash Rakshe
Review Text: Allen is a very good institute to score well in your neet/jee. I am personally studying there ... So it's best i can say .........
